segmentosSRT.text:
Executive Producers:
Kow Fuhong and Christopher Tseng
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: Script: Yu Hua and Lu Wei
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: To frolic in our great big bed
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: To frolic on our great big bed
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: One, two, three. One, two, three.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text:
1958: Mao Zedong launches
the "Great Leap Forward."
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text:
Steel production is now targeted
at 10.7 million tonnes per year.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: Every household donates its iron utensils.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: Our family's turn to donate iron.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: and blinds all who look within
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: I yell there's no time to waste
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: Far away, we flee with haste
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text:
June 1966: Start of the
"Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution."
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text:
- You're eating?
- Come on in, Mr. Niu.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text:
- Don't let me interrupt.
- We're finished.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text:
Nothing compares
to the Party's benevolence
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text:
Chairman Mao is dearer
than father and mother
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: There's nothing as good as socialism
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: No ocean as deep as class feeling
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text:
Maoist Thought
is revolution's treasure trove
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: Whoever opposes it, we take as our enemy
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: Come on, you can't cry today.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: Clear a path! Ship sailing through!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text:
The ship of revolution! Advance
through the storm with Chairman Mao!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text:
We're just students.
We don't know what to do.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia! Mommy's here. Don't be afraid.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27
